<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs=""
>
[Cytillesh](/Equipment.aspx?ID=630)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Drug" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=261" />
<trait label="Ingested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 121</row>

**Price** 30 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Deros use cytillesh in a variety of ways, and some surface-dwellers seek out the fungus for their own use. Memories lost to cytillesh can be restored through [_modify memory_](/Spells.aspx?ID=200). The save for addiction to cytillesh is DC 20, and the addiction has the [virulent](/Traits.aspx?ID=162) trait.

**Saving Throw** DC 15 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 8 hours; **Stage 1** [stupefied 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) (1 minute); **Stage 2** lose all memories made in the previous hour (1 hour)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Cytillesh
